# Robert Stewart (American football coach)

Robert Stewart was an American college football coach. He served as the 11th head football coach for Washburn University in Topeka, Kansas and he held that position for two seasons, from 1909 until 1910. His record at Washburn was 8â€“8. Stewart also served as the athletic director at Washburn for one year.
